name: Boyfriend to Death 2: Fresh blood
description: Boyfriend to Death 2: Fresh Blood is an 18+ "horrorporn" visual novel. It was developed by Gatobob and Electricpuke as a sequel to Boyfriend to Death. The game is intended for adult audiences aged 18 or older due to elements of torture, rape, and other dark concepts. The game was released on March 18, 2017 and is downloadable for free on both PC, Mac, and Android.
